text: "But," said Caderousse, "or I will not answer for it."

passages.full_quote: "<used>But," said Caderousse, a</used>gain smiling with the disagreeable expression he had before assumed, "you must pay for it-you understand?"
"Come, come, Ferna<used>nd," said Caderousse, "h</used>old up your head, and answer us"
<used>said Caderousse, "or I</used> shall be unable to sign it."
cried Danglars, grasping him by th<used>e arm, "or I will not answer</used> even for your own safety"

passages.fragment: I will not answer for it
passages.full_quote: "<used>I will not answer for it</used>," said Monte Cristo
"Indeed, you are such an extraordinary person, that I would <used>not answer for it</used>."
